title: Special Security Program for New Year
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka Police said that a special security plan is in operation island-wide regarding the Sinhala-Tamil New Year.
Police Spokesman SSP Nihal Thalduwa stated that police officers have been deployed for mobile patrols, intelligence, and road security as well as traffic operations.
Shantha Bandara takes oath as State Minister; SLFP calls it a betrayal of policies
Biden Will Press PM Modi On Russia Stand In Virtual Meet Today
